column4: we got major problem in loco channel, one person has updated his computer and now everythign else in usb is lost than hid devices- also he got apic error on cpu0 - any ideas to fix, since we got none.
modprobing other modules causes error
wait, he is missing his usb drivers?
also that.
or his usb devices on the /dev tree?
hid devices works, others don't modprobing causes error in .ko files as they are missing
he probably needs to apt-get his kernel modules, they sound missing... i dont remember the package though...
ok, i locate those and say to install them also.
so he is missing his modules for usb, what else was happening?
well he just installed kernel-image again, and is now rebooting computer
what channel is he in?
#ubuntu-fi
ah, didnt catch it was a language channel earlier..
yep, we runned out of ideas, that's why i came here
he may be expiancing this... http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=292273
tell him to try sudo apt-get install linux-ubuntu-modules-$(uname -r)
if the reinstall of the image does not work, that will install his modules... hopefully
thanks. let's see as (if) he comes back online
he is modifing his host computer? ouch...
i'm afraid he is.
did the person return?
did the person ever get back online?
